extendedInfo.description: Choose 2012 is your 2012 United States Presidential Election headquarters on Android.One of the goals of this app is to take a vote from the Android user base to see who you think should be our next President. So once you've made your informed decision, check the box and press the vote button! Then follow along with the results on the Results page which is updated every 15 minutes.This new app will also be your single source for up-to-the-minute information on the 2012 Presidential candidates: President Barack Obama, Mitt Romney, Joe Biden, Gary Johnson, Jill Stein, and Virgil Goode. Use Choose 2012 to learn about each candidate, read their latest news, follow them on social media channels and visit their websites.Choose 2012 provides easy access to the candidatesâ social networking sites including twitter, facebook, youtube, flickr, and google plus. It also includes quick links to relevant support pages such as donations and events. And you can visit The Pulse for breaking news articles involving candidates and the polls.Planned Features*Poll Incorporation*Campaign Finance data*Tablet UI*Twitter integration (tweet, retweet, follow without leaving app)*Issues and being able to compare/contrast candidate stances on issues*Party InformationThis is a first release so please contact me through the app or at support@brennasoft.com with any issues or feature requests.Permissions*Internet - to pull the data*Access Network State - used by Google Analytics (can be disabled in settings)*Write External Storate - used to cache images

reviews.title: Obama and Romney News Only?
reviews.comment: Gives good details of all the candidates and results but what about the news, I can only see Obama and Romney, despite the apparent aggregating of various news channels - how about Gary Johnson and the others?.  Ironically, the \'Submit Feedback\' doesn\'t work on my Samsung Galaxy S2, I had to use the Google Play website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only romney and obama news
reviews.comment: This app only shows obama and romeny in the news section and this is saddening to me because I got this app to keep up with gary johnson
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: do not download
reviews.comment: this app blows I downloaded it and it locked up my phone twice not sure what caused it but I wouldn\'t download this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Serves its purpose
reviews.comment: This app was not excellent, but told me what I needed to know and I experienced no performance issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best out there
reviews.comment: Best app for election 2012... dont waste time on others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This app seems to pull from a news aggregate and thus sources appear from Fox News, The Wall St Journal, NYTimes, and myriad other sources. Nice to get both sides of the coin, which is increasingly rare these days. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Independent
reviews.comment: The app is independent with no bias what so ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fixed for socialist
reviews.comment: This app is geared to skewing the news, look at the sources it displays...stop shoving Obama down our throats!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Provides good info
reviews.comment: Looks good. Provides good info. Will look forward to the new features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Found better app
reviews.comment: If you want more news, get \"Election 2012 Now\"  I\'ve learned more there than anywhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t install
reviews.comment: Where are the results updates? Nonexistent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very well done.
reviews.comment: Has all the information I\'m looking for through all of the candidates. Could be cleaned up a bit, but all in all it\'s a real good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Go OBAMA
reviews.comment: Obama OBAMA OBAMA OBAMA YOU ROCK BARACK YOU ROCK BARACK!!! GO OBAMA! ! BE OUR PREZIDENT!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
